3: After Rosetta's final blow, Amberia is completely engulfed by the explosion. The cave begins to collapse from the aftermath.
Yeah. Commandant, you might want to lighten up your mech.
I can still move. I think we should get going though, Commandant.
You discard the useless equipment to reduce the weight of the Polar Soldier. Rosetta also rearms her shield.
Commandant, we probably can't leave through the way we came. Remember the closed doors on our way here?
Those doors might lead us elsewhere, or they might even be an emergency exit.
In any case, it should be safer through those doors than being in this place. The cave is about to collapse. With you here, Commandant, I'm sure we'll find a way out.
With the next course of action decided, Rosetta turns to look at the wreckage from the battle before evacuating.
